languages.text: "Ваше присутствие с нами — знак высшего благоволения. Символ того, что Омниссия милосерден к династии фон Валанциус, раз послал нам своего пастыря!"
"Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"
languages.original_text: "Ваше присутствие с нами — знак высшего благоволения. Символ того, что Омниссия милосерден к династии фон Валанциус, раз послал нам своего пастыря!"

traits.locale_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “对我们而言，你的存在本身就是无上的祝福，是欧姆尼塞亚对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝施以仁慈的象征。祂把祂的牧羊人派到了我们身边！”
languages.original_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"

traits.locale_text: “对我们而言，你的存在本身就是无上的祝福，是欧姆尼塞亚对冯·瓦兰修斯王朝施以仁慈的象征。祂把祂的牧羊人派到了我们身边！”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Le fait même que l'Omnimessie nous ait envoyé son propre berger est la preuve qu'Il a béni la dynastie von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"

traits.locale_text: « Le fait même que l'Omnimessie nous ait envoyé son propre berger est la preuve qu'Il a béni la dynastie von Valancius ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Anwesenheit in unserer Mitte ist ein großer Segen. Es ist ein Zeichen des Wohlwollens des Omnissiah gegenüber der Dynastie von Valancius, denn er hat uns {mf|seinen eigenen Hirten|seine eigene Hirtin} geschickt!"
languages.original_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure Anwesenheit in unserer Mitte ist ein großer Segen. Es ist ein Zeichen des Wohlwollens des Omnissiah gegenüber der Dynastie von Valancius, denn er hat uns {mf|seinen eigenen Hirten|seine eigene Hirtin} geschickt!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが我々と共にいてくれるとは、至高の恩寵。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が万機神の博愛を受けている証です。彼の所有する指導者を私たちに遣わしてくださるとは！」
languages.original_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが我々と共にいてくれるとは、至高の恩寵。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝が万機神の博愛を受けている証です。彼の所有する指導者を私たちに遣わしてくださるとは！」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Su presencia es una bendición incomparable. Es muestra de la benevolencia del Omnissiah hacia la dinastía von Valancius: ¡nos ha enviado a su pastor!».
languages.original_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"

traits.locale_text: «Su presencia es una bendición incomparable. Es muestra de la benevolencia del Omnissiah hacia la dinastía von Valancius: ¡nos ha enviado a su pastor!».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Aramızda bulunmanız bile bir lütuftur. Hermesih; von Valancius hanedanlığına nimetlerini lütfetmiş, bize kılavuz göndermiştir!"
languages.original_text: "Your presence among us is a supreme blessing. It is a sign of the Omnissiah's benevolence toward the von Valancius dynasty, for He has sent us His own shepherd!"
